supplies - 1 75 mm crochet hook - yarn yarnart jeans green color 69 orange color 70 - scissors stitch marker or scrap piece of yarn - soft stuffing - yarn needle tip you can use the same pattern to make larger or smaller toys by using finer or bulkier yarn also you can use a different color yarn pick a crochet hook at least a size smaller than suggested on yarn label and crochet tightly enough fasten_off and attach to a sewing needle pass through the centre of the magicring start and through the centre of the pumpkin and back through the bottom centre pull yarn to tighten you can watch a
